subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets finished off a four-game sweep of the Marlins with a big fourth inning, but pitcher Jerry Blevins fractured his forearm and catcher Travis d’Arnaud broke his hand.
snippet: The Mets finished off a four-game sweep of the Marlins with a big fourth inning, but pitcher Jerry Blevins fractured his forearm and catcher Travis d’Arnaud broke his hand.
